document.full_text: vancouver, seeking its first championship in its 40th season, and boston, chasing its first title since 1972, begin the stanley cup finals on wednesday.
document.title: for either canucks or bruins, four decades of waiting is about to end
lines_and_colors: vancouver, seeking its first championship in its 40th season, and boston, chasing its first title since 1972, begin the stanley cup finals on wednesday.
